ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Akebono LEP ion and electron spectral plots
ResourceHeader.Description:
These data consist of plots of color-coded ion 
and electron count rates vs. energy and time, in each of several
pitch angle bins.  The energy ranges are 13ev/Q to 20keV/Q (ions) 
and 10eV to 16keV (electrons).  Each plot covers some or all of 
one ~3.5 hour orbit.  ASCII data are also accessible.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
In any publications, the use of the Akebono data 
should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono LEP data were provided 
by T. Mukai through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, 
JAXA in Japan."

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement:
In any publications, the use of the Akebono data 
should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono LEP data were provided 
by T. Mukai through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, 
JAXA in Japan."

NumericalData.Caveats:
LEP count rate data may still contain background noise 
depending on pitch angles.  The data less than 1000 cps may be 
unreliable.  Those less than 300 cps may be very unreliable.
